project_title: AIとロボットが協力する未来の製品紹介動画

dialogue_files.text: 未来は、AIとロボットの完璧な協力から生まれます。
データと物理世界の融合が、新たなイノベーションを創造し、
私たちの技術は、想像を超えた製品体験を実現します。

background_music.description: Cinematic orchestral music with electronic elements for a professional AI and robotics corporate video
background_music.usage_notes: Modern, sophisticated sound with building intensity. Perfect for futuristic technology presentation.

production_notes.voice_selection: Elegant_Man voice chosen for professional, sophisticated tone appropriate for corporate technology presentation
production_notes.emotional_progression: Neutral tone for informative sections, transitioning to happy/uplifting for the closing message
production_notes.music_style: Cinematic orchestral with electronic elements to match the futuristic AI/robotics theme
production_notes.sync_guidelines: Each dialogue segment is timed to match corresponding scene duration. Background music should be mixed at lower volume to allow dialogue clarity.
